title: Nice Buzz
author: Aleister
citation: Aleister. "Nice Buzz: experience with Morphine sulphate & Lorazepam (ID 67020)". Erowid.org. Jan 26, 2010. erowid.org/exp/67020

report:
T 7:25 PM

Took 4 10 mg morphine sulphate pentahydrate and chewed them (effective 7,5 mg x 4 = 30 mg of morphine)

7:40 PM

feel a little drowsy.

7:50 PM

drowsier, a feeling of detachment.

7:55 PM

funny feeling.

7:28 PM

feel happy, smiling, slightly 'cosy'and warm. enjoyment. nice.

7:45 PM

serene detachment, happiness

10:05 PM

2 Lorazepam 10mg
